+L14:L18EXAMPLES:  G, MG, ML, UG.]

derived_variable_level_data.Question: What was the dose form of [study treatment/dose]?

derived_variable_level_data.Question: What was the route of administration of [study treatment/dose]?
derived_variable_level_data.Response_Options:
[PROTOCOL-SPECIFIC TEXT RESPONSE OPTIONS. ROUTE OF ADMINISTRATION. PLEASE USE THE CDASH ‚EXPOSURE ROUTE OF ADMINISTRATION" CODE LIST C66729 CONTROLLED TERMINOLOGY.
EXAMPLES:  ORAL, NASAL, INTRAMUSCULAR, RESPIRATORY (INHALATION)]

derived_variable_level_data.Question: What was the frequency of [study treatment/dose] dosing?
derived_variable_level_data.Response_Options:
[PROTOCOL-SPECIFIC TEXT RESPONSE OPTIONS. PLEASE USE THE CDASH ‚EXPOSURE DOSING FREQUENCY" CODE LIST C78745 CONTROLLED TERMINOLOGY.

variable.variable_name: Plasminogen is the proenzyme of plasmin, the major enzyme that degrades fibrin clots. Measured using ELISA.
variable.variable_description: Plasminogen is the proenzyme of plasmin, the major enzyme that degrades fibrin clots. Measured using ELISA.
variable.data_hierarchy: ACTIV4A//KimLab/Plasminogen is the proenzyme of plasmin, the major enzyme that degrades fibrin clots. Measured using ELISA.

variable.variable_name: PAI-1 is the primary inhibitor of both tissue-type plasminogen activator (tPA) and urinary-type plasminogen activator (uPA) [2]. Measured using ELISA.
variable.variable_description: PAI-1 is the primary inhibitor of both tissue-type plasminogen activator (tPA) and urinary-type plasminogen activator (uPA) [2]. Measured using ELISA.
variable.data_hierarchy: ACTIV4A//KimLab/PAI-1 is the primary inhibitor of both tissue-type plasminogen activator (tPA) and urinary-type plasminogen activator (uPA) [2]. Measured using ELISA.

variable.variable_name: Thrombomodulin (TM) is an endothelial cell surface receptor specific for thrombin. TM is involved in promoting activation of the anticoagulant protein C pathway during coagulation [3]. Soluble TM is the product of proteolytic degradation of endothelial-bound TM. When the endothelium is damaged, endothelial-bound TM is released from the endothelial surface, resulting in a significant increase in sTM concentration [4]. Measured using ELISA.
variable.variable_description: Thrombomodulin (TM) is an endothelial cell surface receptor specific for thrombin. TM is involved in promoting activation of the anticoagulant protein C pathway during coagulation [3]. Soluble TM is the product of proteolytic degradation of endothelial-bound TM. When the endothelium is damaged, endothelial-bound TM is released from the endothelial surface, resulting in a significant increase in sTM concentration [4]. Measured using ELISA.
variable.data_hierarchy: ACTIV4A//KimLab/Thrombomodulin (TM) is an endothelial cell surface receptor specific for thrombin. TM is involved in promoting activation of the anticoagulant protein C pathway during coagulation [3]. Soluble TM is the product of proteolytic degradation of endothelial-bound TM. When the endothelium is damaged, endothelial-bound TM is released from the endothelial surface, resulting in a significant increase in sTM concentration [4]. Measured using ELISA.

variable.variable_name: The last 3 of the VTID, they are the last 3 numbers of each samples VTID without unnecessary 0’s. variable.variable_name: average of anti-PF4/heparin IgG OD450. OD450 is essentially a measure of absorbance, but there are not really units to be associated with it. You can leave values labeled as OD450, that’s conventional for ELISA data.

variable.variable_name: EDTA plasma SARS-CoV-2 N RNA copies per milliliter by custom assay. Values 2.67-5.33 defined as 2.67 (5.33 / 2). Values below 2.67 defined as 1.89 (2.67 / square root of 2)
variable.variable_description: EDTA plasma SARS-CoV-2 N RNA copies per milliliter by custom assay. Values 2.67-5.33 defined as 2.67 (5.33 / 2). Values below 2.67 defined as 1.89 (2.67 / square root of 2)

derived_variable_level_data.LLOD: Values between blank and 24.4 defined as 17.25 (24.4 / square root of 2). Values below blank defined as 12.2 (24.4 / 2). Values above high standard calculated by MSD software.
derived_variable_level_data.ULOD: Values between blank and 24.4 defined as 17.25 (24.4 / square root of 2). Values below blank defined as 12.2 (24.4 / 2). Values above high standard calculated by MSD software.

variable.variable_name: EDTA plasma SARS-CoV-2 N antigen picograms per milliliter by Mesoscale Discovery (MSD) S plex assay. Standard values do not account for 2X dilution performed prior to assay.
variable.variable_description: EDTA plasma SARS-CoV-2 N antigen picograms per milliliter by Mesoscale Discovery (MSD) S plex assay. Standard values do not account for 2X dilution performed prior to assay.
variable.data_hierarchy: ACTIV4A//Pitt_Bain/EDTA plasma SARS-CoV-2 N antigen picograms per milliliter by Mesoscale Discovery (MSD) S plex assay. Standard values do not account for 2X dilution performed prior to assay.

derived_variable_level_data.LLOD: Values adjusted for 2X dilution. Adjusted values above low standard defined as 0.1122 (0.1587 / square root of 2). Adjusted values below low standard defined as 0.079 (0.1587 /2).
derived_variable_level_data.ULOD: Values above high standard calculated by MSD software.

variable.variable_name: EDTA plasma SARS-CoV-2 N antigen picograms per milliliter by Quanterix Simoa assay. Standard values do not account for 4X dilution performed by machine.
variable.variable_description: EDTA plasma SARS-CoV-2 N antigen picograms per milliliter by Quanterix Simoa assay. Standard values do not account for 4X dilution performed by machine.
variable.data_hierarchy: ACTIV4A//Pitt_Bain/EDTA plasma SARS-CoV-2 N antigen picograms per milliliter by Quanterix Simoa assay. Standard values do not account for 4X dilution performed by machine.

derived_variable_level_data.ULOD: Values below LLOD (0.09 per manufacturer) defined as 0.07 (0.09 / square root of 2). Values above ULOD calculated by Quanterix software. Values beyond calculable range defined as maximum value plus 1.

variable.variable_name: EDTA plasma angipoietin-2 picograms per milliliter by custom Luminex assay. Calculated values beyond standard curve provided by Luminex software were included.
variable.variable_description: EDTA plasma angipoietin-2 picograms per milliliter by custom Luminex assay. Calculated values beyond standard curve provided by Luminex software were included.
variable.data_hierarchy: ACTIV4A//Pitt_Bain/EDTA plasma angipoietin-2 picograms per milliliter by custom Luminex assay. Calculated values beyond standard curve provided by Luminex software were included.

derived_variable_level_data.LLOD: Values below calculable range were defined as minimum calculated value divided by square root of 2.
derived_variable_level_data.ULOD: Values above calculable range were defined as maximum calculated value plus 1.

variable.variable_name: The last 3 of the VTID, they are the last 3 numbers of each samples VTID without unnecessary 0’s. For example, VTID 100002 would be just the number 2 in that column and sample 100023 would be 23. VTIDs are also derived from the excel spreadsheet ACTIV-4 A INPT_Kreuziger Mechanistics AS_Shipped 021622
